extendedInfo.description: Book reader with powerful controls & full functions.*Read thousands of ebooks for free, supports online ebook libraries.*Read local books with smooth scroll and tons of innovation.Support epub, mobi, chm, cbr, cbz, umd, fb2, txt, html, rar, zip or OPDS, key features:â¢ Full visual options: line space, font scale, bold, italic, shadow, justified alignment, alpha colors, fading edge etc.â¢ 10+ themes embedded, includes Day & Night mode switcher.â¢ Various types of paging: touch screen, volume keys or even camera, search or back keys.â¢ 24 customized operations (screen click, swipe gesture, hardware keys), apply to 15 customized events: search, bookmark, themes, navigation, font size and more.â¢ 5 auto-scroll modes: rolling blind mode; by pixel, by line or by page. Real-time speed control.â¢ Adjust the brightness by sliding your finger along the left edge of the screen, gesture commands supported.â¢ Intelligent paragraph; indent paragraph; trim unwanted blank spaces options.â¢ âKeep your eyes healthâ options for long-time reading.â¢ Real page turning effect with customized speed/color/transparent; 5 page flip animations;â¢ My Bookshelf design: Favorites, Downloads, Authors, Tags; self bookcover, search, import supported.â¢ Justified text alignment, hyphenation mode supported.â¢ Dual page mode for landscape screen.â¢ Support all four screen orientations.â¢ EPUB3 multimedia content support (video and audio)â¢ Backup/Restore options to cloud via DropBox, sync reading positions between phones and tablets.â¢ Highlight, Annotation, Dictionary (Offline or Online, support ColorDict, GoldenDict, Fora, ABBYY Lingvo, etc.), Translation, Share functions all in this ebook reader.â¢ Localized in 40 languages: English, á áá­á, reviews.title: Great app, but please, more settings of the bar!
reviews.comment: Please add more settings for status bar: as for me I prefer to have info about current/all pages in book, but not in chapter, also I dont care about battery (this app shows battery only with 10% degree for my phone)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simply Amazing!
reviews.comment: Have been using Moon+ Reader for a while now, and it is simply amazing because it just works. I believe real readers developed it. Cheers guys
reviews.author: Olabode James

reviews.title: Wonderful reader, full control
reviews.comment: Easy to change font-size, colors, select a word to look it up in installed dictionaries (I have colordict), nice page turning effects, excellent file manager, direct access to online sources of free and paid books. Many format support . I paid just because I love the app
reviews.author: victor zlotnicki

reviews.title: Pretty much perfect.
reviews.comment: No need for any other reader. This one does it all.
reviews.author: Juan de Beer

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: By far my favourite reader app. Ease of use outstanding
reviews.author: Laura Mackenzie

reviews.title: Good reader, but...
reviews.comment: Very versatile but overcomplicated for what it needs to do? Opened a tricky mobi file that Cool Reader couldn\'t!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thumbs up - Xperia Z Tablet user
reviews.comment: Versatile, slick, and easy to use. Handles various file formats and navigation is smoothly. By far the best ereader I\'ve used so far. That confident with it that I recently installed into my grandmother\'s tablet too.
reviews.author: Martyn Hockless

reviews.title: Works better for me...
reviews.comment: I needed format flexibility and this program has met my needs better than any other program.
reviews.author: Rosemary Walker

reviews.title: Great reader..... The best one yet!
reviews.comment: Great way to read a book it has some really great features....  I Love this reader it is the best!
reviews.author: Lorraine ENWRIGHT-BENNETT

reviews.title: Apps is brilliant!
reviews.comment: Being a old-school book reader found it hard to get into e readers. As an app this is very good with tons of features even in free mode.
reviews.author: Akash Badiani

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Easy to use.  Love it.
reviews.author: bahamasoapmama

reviews.title: The pages are filled with meaning, and they appear sequentially!
reviews.comment: They promised the Moon and then some, but what they actually delivered appears to differ from that promise, at least from my current perspective. Still, they make it easy to find public domain ebooks, even those that demand a small fee elsewhere.    These ebooks have proven to be worthless to me as doodely flipbook animation vehicles, however they are consistently rich with alphabetic symbols and their related meanings.   I give \'em 5 stars, but I\'m unsure of the appropriate color.
reviews.author: Ken Hunt

reviews.title: Better than kindle!
reviews.comment: I have a kindle and sometimes it freezes our it says the files are corrupt. This app hasn\'t had a hiccup yet.
reviews.author: Dustin McLaughlin

reviews.title: Great App!!
reviews.comment: Simply great.
reviews.author: Shahvir Aga

reviews.title: Mi preferido.
reviews.comment: Excelente. Me gusta que muestre la hora, el porcentaje que llevas le\303\255do del cap\303\255tulo, la bater\303\255a que queda.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple to use
reviews.comment: Thanks
reviews.author: Stuart Hurworth

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Reads multiple formats clearly with no garbage text. Excellent freeware.
reviews.author: Casy Bouwmeester

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: sudipto goswami

reviews.title: Super
reviews.comment: Pls add Enid blyton classics..superb app for readers and book addicts
reviews.author: PALANIAPPAN SOMASUNDARAM

reviews.title: USEFUL
reviews.comment: IT IS USEFUL FOR ME.
reviews.author: Myo Naing
